Class AStarGraphFactoryPathFinder

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.model.impl.AStarGraphFactoryPathFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
FactoryPathFinder
public class AStarGraphFactoryPathFinder extends Object implements FactoryPathFinder
Implements a path finder for the factory using a graph-based approach and A* algorithm. Builds a graph of the factory layout and computes shortest paths for robots.

      robot - The robot for which to compute paths.

    • buildFactoryGraph

      public static org.jgrapht.Graph<Position, org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultWeightedEdge> buildFactoryGraph(Factory factory, int robotWidth, int robotHeight)
      Builds a graph representation of the factory for pathfinding.
      Parameters:
      factory - The factory to build the graph from.
      robotWidth - The width of the robot.
      robotHeight - The height of the robot.
      Returns:
      The constructed graph.

      public Path findPath(Visitable target)
      Finds the shortest path from the robot's current position to the target visitable.
      Specified by:
      findPath in interface FactoryPathFinder
      Parameters:
      target - The target visitable to reach.
